Segment.name: PKD
Segment.comment: To specify a package description and other information

Field.name: PackagingCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the type of packaging; Part 1: Packaging Form, Part 2: Packaging Material; if the Data Element is used, then Part 1 is always required

Field.name: SourceSubqualifier
Field.comment: A reference that indicates the table or text maintained by the Source Qualifier

Field.name: AgencyQualifierCode
Field.comment: Code identifying the agency assigning the code values

Field.name: PackagingDescriptionCode
Field.comment: A code from an industry code list which provides specific data about the marking, packaging or loading and unloading of a product

Field.name: OwnershipCode
Field.comment: Code indicating the relationship of equipment to carrier or ownership of equipment

SyntaxNote.name: C0201
SyntaxNote.comment: If PKD02 is present, then PKD01 is required.

SyntaxNote.name: C0302
SyntaxNote.comment: If PKD03 is present, then PKD02 is required.
